My Account Order details - Order Cancellation - Verify Cancel button displayed if order is Pending Shipment.
My Account Order details - Order Cancellation - Verify clicking on X closes the cancel order modal.
My Account Order details - Order Cancellation - Verify clicking on No,Go Back closes the cancel order modal.
My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify clicking on X closes the cancel Item modal.

My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify clicking on Cancel Item on, application opens a cancel item modal along with following options:- Yes, Cancel the product- No, Go back to the Order- X option

My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify clicking on 'Cancel Item' button, modal gets closed, page gets refreshed and application shows the order status as 'Cancelled' on the applicable item.
My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify clicking on No,Go Back closes the cancel Item modal.
My Account Order details - Order Cancellation - Verify clicking on Yes, application closes the modal, refreshes the page and order status gets changed to Canceled.
My Account Order details - Write a Product Review - Verify clicking on the 'Write a Product Review' button, application opens a modal hosted from Power Reviews integration.
My Account Order details - Shipment Details - Verify following details are shown in the Shipment section:- Shipment (number).
My Account Order details - Return/Refund Information - Verify display of refund information in the Order Summary section.
My Account Order details - Write a Product Review - Verify 'Write a Product Review' button is shown only if the order status is marked 'Delivered'.
My Account Order details - Return/Refund Information - Verify display of return information in the Order Summary section.
Test defects
Test timeout of 90000ms exceeded.
Verify DPQ Navigation from the link - logged In User - check submission status
Cart - Display Additional Text for Guest Users - Verify application shows the additional text - 'Have an account? Sign in to view items that were previously added to your cart'.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Guest Users - Verify clicking on the Sign in text link, application generates the Sign In Drawer.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Guest Users -  Verify clicking the Sign In btn, application opens the Sign In Drawer.
Cart - Sign In Functionality for Logged In Users -  Verify clicking the Sign In btn, application opens the Sign In Drawer and user can logged In.
Cart - Continue Shopping CTA Functionality for Logged In Users - Verify clicking on the Continue Shopping btn, application redirects user to the homepage.
HP-Full Width Banner - Verify the display and functionality of full-width banners, including image/video content and redirection upon click
GPH-Account Drawer - Verify generation of the account drawer upon clicking the Account icon
GPH-Account State Update - Verify the header update to display the logged-in user state, display of user's first name under the Account icon
GPH-Sign In/Sign Out - Verify the Test successful sign in/out functionality, display of success messages, redirection behavior upon sign out
Cart Drawer - Handling quantity adjustments in the cart - Verify user is able to type in the quantity.
Account - Addresses - Remove and Undo Remove Address - Verify clicking on 'Remove' button, the selected address gets deleted and the data removed from the Addresses page.
Account - Credit Cards - Standard With Saved Cards - Verify clicking on Edit button, application expands the edit card form with pre-populated data- Expiry date- Billing address.
Account - Address - Verify Default address is shown in the Addresses section along with View Addresses link

My Account Order details - Item Cancellation - Verify if an item within a multiple item order has not been processed or shipped, application displays 'Cancel Item' button with the text 'Changed your mind?' within the bottom righthand corner of the item detail card.
PDP - Quantity update - Verify Quantity update on clicking the plus and minus button:
Test timeout of 270000ms exceeded.
Verify add/edit New Address - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping scenario
Verify Different Address(Billing/Shipping) message - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
Verify Billing Address edit section - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
Verify Billing Address edit section for Credit User - Checkout Scenario for the loggedIn user - go to shipping section
